about_the_game:
The Mid-Season Finale is Here!

NSFW Gay Visual Novel Dating Sim!

Black Ops soldiers Wraith and Tide know they must count on each other to survive. Will their bond as battle-brothers evolve into something more? Monster Ops: Military Special Forces Hunting Rogue Monsters!

This is an open-ended series with no ending planned. It's like a TV show that will continue until it's canceled.

Things were heating up between Tide and Wraith until their Commander called out Captain Wraith for taking advantage of a subordinate!  Now Wraith has to push Tide away, or Tide could be removed from the team.

Then, after Wraith is forced to have that terrible conversation with Tide--Tide is gone!  Will the last words spoken between the two men be ones of rejection?

The action-packed mid-season finale introduces two nefarious new monsters and an extra special guest star from a different Y Press Game!

An on-going visual novel series with new 1 to 2 hour stand-alone game episodes coming out monthly in 2025! 

Our season premieres will be free, and subsequent episodes paid.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of explicit sexual content between adults.  The villains are drug dealers and child traffickers in this episode.  None of their crimes are depicted nor described in detail.  Their crimes are condemned in the narrative.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13 or Higher
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
